drinks.name: Pepper drink
drinks.description: This drink tastes like pepper, it is disguisting. Most people spit it our, but that doesn't stop us

drinks.name: Daquiri drink
drinks.description: This drink tastes like Strawberry, it is lovely. This is our most famous drink

drinks.name: Salty drink
drinks.description: This drink tastes like salt, it is disguisting and awful. Most people spit it our, but what do we care

drinks.name: wine drink
drinks.description: This drink isn't a drink, it's wine, regular wine from Spain

drinks.name: some drink
drinks.description: This is a drink, it is disguisting or maybe good? Most people don't know what it is, it'll always be a secret

drinks.name: Sweet'n'sour drink
drinks.description: This drink tastes like sweet and sour, it is disguisting. Most people spit it out on the floor, but that doesn't stop us

drinks.name: Lemon drink
drinks.description: This drink tastes like lemon, it is wonderfull. Most people don't spit it our, that is what keep us going
